Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung in Cuba 
    Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- A function of laying a floral basket before the portrait of President Kim Il Sung took place at Kim Il Sung Economic Special School in Cuba on Oct. 7 on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
 Present there were the chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, the principal and teachers and employees of the school, the ambassador and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Havana.    
 The participants placed a floral basket before the portrait of the President and paid tribute to him.

Visits
    Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Group for the Study of Juche Idea of University of Kinshasa of Democratic Congo headed by its Chairman Vele-Mukileng Roland arrived here on Tuesday. 
 Meanwhile, returning home were Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, and his party, a delegation of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola headed by Ferreira Pinto, member of the Political Bureau and chairman of the Control Commission of its Central Committee, a delegation of the Communist Party of Cuba led by Oscar Martinez Cordoves, deputy head of the International Department of its Central Committee, and Li Hai Yang, president of the SG Automotive Group of China, and his party, and a delegation of the Japanese Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea headed by Chairman Motofumi Makieta, which  had participated in celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.

Torchlight Procession Symbolic of Revolutionary Torch
    Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- A torchlight procession of youth and students was held with grandeur at Kim Il Sung Square in Pyongyang of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on the evening of October 10 to mark the 60th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
 Splendid were the sea of torchlight and the stream of torchlight procession ranks of youth and students, the reliable young vanguards of the WPK passing by the platform. 
 The procession consisted of 11 chapters. It, with the flag of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League in the van, stepped across the square, forming over 20 formations and nearly 100 letters reflecting 60-year glorious history covered by the ever-victorious WPK under the banner of Songun and proud features of the young vanguard who have distinguished themselves under the guidance of the Party.    
 The participants made with torchlights Mt. Paektu and other formations and letters including "Kim Il Sung",  "Kim Jong Il", "Juche Idea" and "Rifles and Bombs" at the square and procession ranks. They well reflected the unswerving will of the youth and students to rally close around revolutionary headquarters and carry to accomplishment without fail the revolutionary cause pioneered in the forest of Mt. Paektu, holding aloft the torch of Juche like the first generation young vanguard of the revolution who founded the Down-with-Imperialism Union, the root of the WPK.    
 The procession ranks marched past, making formations including the emblem of the Party and the red banner and words including "Invincibility", "Unity in Mind", "Comradeship", "Songun Politics" and "Great Prosperous Powerful Nation". They manifested their resolution to certainly build the great prosperous powerful socialist nation as the young vanguards of the Party that has led the Korean revolution along the one road of victory and glory.
 The torchlight kindled at the dawn of the Korean revolution is furiously blazing up at the hands of the successors to the revolution under the leadership of Kim Jong Il. The torchlight turned the nocturnal sky of October red, in reflection of their heroic stamina to glorify Kim Il Sung's Korea, Songun Korea, under the leadership of the Party.
